name: She Wants Me Dead
overview: Help Max escape from his fate and survive this purrfect punishment. She Wants Him Dead Lula is just an average cat who happens to be a master engineer. Her traps are intricate and require your full focus. Expect no mercy and lots of surprises. Unforgiving but rewarding Sink into the world of She Wants Me Dead thanks to the incredible soundtrack. The rhythm is the key to Max's survival. If you let it lead you, he might see the light of day. This 2D platformer-rhythm game will not make it easy on you. Key Features: - Incredible groovy soundtrack - Unique aesthetic - 2D platformer - Rhythm game
